name: The HoneyPlot
description:
In a future where bees reign supreme you are one of many human test subjects tasked with proving your species worthiness.

Walk with the arrow keys
Jump with Shift
Pick up with E

A late entry into the MajorJam with the theme "Space" and the limitation "The player must cheat".
A work in progress with no ending programmed yet.

Composer: Neverdusk
SFX, Scriptwriting and Voice recording: Bopeuph
Programming: Victormt
Art and Animation: Drillbit
